GUILDPROMOTE_DESCRIPTION: Use this command to promote a member of your guild to a higher rank
MUST_BE_FOUNDER: {{author}} You must be a **Founder** or **Guildmaster** to promote a member of the guild
NO_GUILD_INFO: {{author}} Could not find guild info for that user
NOT_MEMBER: {{author}} This user is not a member of your guild
ALREADY_FOUNDER: {{author}} This user is already a **Founder** of the guild
PROVIDE_FOUNDER_RANK:
{{author}} Provide a guild rank to promote:
> **F**ounder, **G**uildmaster, **V**eteran
PROVIDE_VETERAN_RANK:
{{author}} Provide a guild rank to promote:
> **V**eteran
ONLY_VETERAN_CAN_BE_GUILDMASTER: {{author}} Only **Adventurers** and **Veterans** can be promoted to **Guildmaster**
TRANSFER_OWNERSHIP_CONFIRM: **You are about to transfer guild ownership to {{member}}. Are you sure?**
